event.title: Confuse Regarding The Number Of Moving Boxes You Will Require? Solve It Here By Reading Packers And Movers Bangalore Guide
event.description:
It’s a pretty tricky question when we are moving that- how many moving boxed we will be requiring. Gathering the moving boxes is the very first step in preparing for a move, without it we can’t proceed if you are doing a self relocation, ya it’s hard to accurately estimate the moving boxes only by looking around your home, and we also don’t have time to dig around the whole household items and then decide what we have to do so here we follow our very simple logic that is “estimation" so you just put your estimation and we will give it more shape by guiding you through this Packers and Movers Bangalore guide.

It’s hectic and time consuming when we are middle of our work and see what our moving boxes are out of stock need to buy or rent more, after so much trouble of gathering even this much we again have to go through the same process, the more complications will be added if you are moving within less time, we all in rush mainly things go bad then good. So estimating correctly is our foremost and main step but if you are hiring any professionals like Movers and Packers in Bangalore for your move then you don’t have to worry for such things even a little, because they have years of experience in this field and have qualified and trained team for carrying out relocation effectively and efficiently. For providing accuracy in price and supplies Packers and Movers in Bangalore do a survey of your home in which they look around your home and ask you relevant question which helps them in computing what kind of equipment, packing material and boxes they will require to do your job. You don’t have to worry about safety of your household goods when you hire Packers and Movers Bangalore because they have lasted tracking system for keeping you updated with your shipment status, also you can avail transit insurance from Movers and Packers Bangalore for more safety of your goods. You can find varieties of moving boxes in the market but for avoiding confusion we will keep it simple and discuss only 3 very common sizes.

S= small (1.5cu ft.)
M= medium (3cu ft.)
L= large (4.5cu ft.)
There are 4 factors which can help us estimate how much boxes we will require for our goods.

Number of members
Size of home
Amount of household items
Number of members:
One member:
One bedroom apartment with less household items will require 2L+14M+5S moving boxes.

Two member:

If living in one bedroom apartment will require 4L+ 18M+9S.

If have lots of stuffs like sports gear, office, home, lots of books then this move will probably need 6L+ 36M+9S.

3 member (include one young child)
For one to two bedroom they will probably need 4L+24M+5S, but if have three bedroom then go for 6L+29M+8S.

If you have lots of household stuffs then go for 8L+30M+19S.

Four or more members:
Living simply in two to three bedroom apartments will easily need 7L+ 34M+9S.

Living in three to four bedroom house but will average amount of household stuffs then need 9L+35M+19S.

Living in a four bedroom house with lots of goods like sport gear, office, books etc. then will easily need 12L+60M+29S.

Size of home:
Around 400sq ft. To 800sq ft.
3L+15M+5S up to 5L+23M+10S.

Around 800sq ft. To 1300sq ft.
5L+20M+7S up to 7L+30M+13S.

Around 1300sq ft. To 2000sq ft.
6L+25M+7S up to 8L+43M+19S.

Around 2000sq ft. To 3500sq ft.
6L+39M+11S up to 12L+55M+ 30S.

Amount of household items:

Note this down that amount of household goods vary from people to people because people can be minimalist or a collector. You may have some hobby or indulge in some activities so relatively your goods will be more in amount then the ones who don’t so, for estimating the number of moving boxes you have to think like this-

Bedrooms – count your linens, dressers, closets and under the bed stuffs.
Kitchen – simple bachelor will require around 6M boxes and professional foodie will require around 20M boxes.

Living room- How many books, movies, games, desks and files you have.

Bathroom- at least couple of boxes unless you have home spa.

Other- check other stuffs and see your cupboards and closet and then estimate.

For any help feel free and easy to call Packers and Movers Bangalore.

Packers And Movers Bangalore @ https://packersmoversbangalore.in/
